meanings.definition: The quality or state of being illimitable.
meanings.sent1: The illimitablenesses of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The concept of illimitablenesses in space is hard to grasp.
meanings.sent3: The illimitablenesses of the buffet left everyone feeling full and happy.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination knew no illimitablenesses, reaching far beyond reality.
meanings.sent5: The artist's canvas captured the illimitablenesses of the sky at sunset.

meanings.definition: The property of being limitless or boundless.
meanings.sent1: The illimitablenesses of the desert seemed endless under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: His dreams were filled with illimitablenesses, reaching beyond the stars.
meanings.sent3: The illimitablenesses of the ice cream shop made choosing a flavor difficult.
meanings.sent4: The love between them knew no illimitablenesses, growing stronger each day.
meanings.sent5: The forest whispered secrets of illimitablenesses to those who listened closely.
